app.title: WeiLend

buttons.payInstallment: Pay an Installment of a Loan

headers.big: Bring your creative project to life
headers.small: Next generation crowd lending is here.
headers.dontForget: Dont Forget to Add Your Loan Image

deploy.title: Deploy WeiLend
deploy.isUndeployed: Deploy the core WeiLend crowdlending contract by clicking 'Deploy'.
deploy.isError: There was an error deploying the core WeiLend contract. This was the error:
deploy.isMining: The WeiLend contract is being mined, this may take a minute...
deploy.isMined: Your WeiLend contract has been mined!
deploy.isMined_1: WeiLend has been deployed to the address below. It will be stored in your browser until you clear your browser cache.
deploy.isMined_2: If you would like to set this address as the primary WeiLend address, copy the address provided and change the LocalStore.set('weilendAddress'... value in 'app/client/index.js'.

startLoan.isMining: Your loan is being processed. Please wait one moment...
startLoan.isError: There was an error processing (mining) your loan. The error is as follows:
details: All funds are in the Ether denomination
If your loan goal is not reached by the alloted time period, all ether is returned to the respective doners
If your loan goal is reached, the funds will be available to the beneficiary address provided
Please provide a website url and loan name below 32 characters
A loan ID will be provided after the loan is started, use this to promote your loan

text.about_1: A Better Way To Crowd Lend
text.about_2: WeiLend is a free to use, totally open-source p2p lending platform built on Ethereum.
text.about_4: WeiLend is proudly build with Ethereum, a decentralized open-source consensus ecosystem that enables a more free and secure internet.
text.about_6: Our philosophy is simple: clean design, totally decentralized, 100% open-sourced, minimalist, no fee, light, and reactive.
text.start_1: Fill out your project details below and get crowd lending!
text.start_2: Upload a 500px by 300px PNG image titled 'weilend.png' (without the quotes) to your website's main directory.
text.start_3: **Note, this is the image that will be used on WeiLend.

text.failed: Ah, snap... This loan has expired and could not raise enough funds.
text.success: This loan has reached it's goal!
text.payoutProcessed: This loan has been payedout, whoohoo!
text.donationProcessed: Your donation has been processed, thankyou!
